page.title: 18My day.
page.content: After I get up at 7 o'clock and eat my breakfast I go up stairs to have a wash and then down stairs and mum makes my sandwiches.Then I go and put my sandwhiches in a bag and I watch Tv,AM for 10 minutes.I put my coat on and go and call for my friend at 20 to 8 and we walk to school in time for assembly we come back and do some work and then it is play time.After play we go to our class and work and then have lunch and play for 20 minutes. After lunch we some times do craft. We go home at 3-15 I go out to play with Sam and then I go in for my tea at 5-30. I go out at 6,oclock and play till 7,oclock and then go in and put my nighty on.I go and get my supper and sit down and look at the TV and go to bed at 9 o'clock.
